name: Master Archer
description:
Become the legendary master archer and see how long you can last against endless waves of enemy archers. Upgrade your skills and arrows to destroy enemy stickman archers in this bow hunting game. Sharpen your archery and shooting skills and become a master archer.

How to play:

Use left mouse button to aim, releasing the button will release the arrow.

Extra rewards every 10 enemies you kill and each headshot.

Upgrade your stats or make your arrows more deadly.

First game i made using Godot. ( ͡❛ ▿ ͡❛)
